title: Error when installing the present tool
body:
There's a compilation error when trying to install the `present` tool. @campoy 

Here's the full output:
```
[simon@NV55C ~]$ go get -v -u golang.org/x/tools/present
Fetching https://golang.org/x/tools/present?go-get=1
Parsing meta tags from https://golang.org/x/tools/present?go-get=1 (status code 200)
get "golang.org/x/tools/present": found meta tag main.metaImport{Prefix:"golang.org/x/tools", VCS:"git", RepoRoot:"https://go.googlesource.com/tools"} at https://golang.org/x/tools/present?go-get=1
get "golang.org/x/tools/present": verifying non-authoritative meta tag
Fetching https://golang.org/x/tools?go-get=1
Parsing meta tags from https://golang.org/x/tools?go-get=1 (status code 200)
golang.org/x/tools (download)
golang.org/x/tools/present
# golang.org/x/tools/present
Code/Go/src/golang.org/x/tools/present/code.go:32: undefined: Register
Code/Go/src/golang.org/x/tools/present/code.go:33: undefined: Register
Code/Go/src/golang.org/x/tools/present/code.go:59: undefined: Elem
Code/Go/src/golang.org/x/tools/present/code.go:59: undefined: Context
Code/Go/src/golang.org/x/tools/present/code.go:92: undefined: addrToByteRange
```

My system information:
`go version go1.7.1 linux/amd64`
```
GOARCH="amd64"
GOBIN=""
GOEXE=""
GOHOSTARCH="amd64"
GOHOSTOS="linux"
GOOS="linux"
GOPATH="/home/simon/Code/Go"
GORACE=""
GOROOT="/usr/lib/go"
GOTOOLDIR="/usr/lib/go/pkg/tool/linux_amd64"
CC="gcc"
GOGCCFLAGS="-fPIC -m64 -pthread -fmessage-length=0 -fdebug-prefix-map=/tmp/go-build900392660=/tmp/go-build -gno-record-gcc-switches"
CXX="g++"
CGO_ENABLED="1"
```
